### Exercise 2

```{r}
mets <- Teams  %>%  
  dplyr::filter(teamID == "NYN")
my_mets <- mets %>% 
  dplyr::filter(_yearID %in% 2004:2012)
my_mets %>% 
  dplyr::select(yearId,G,W,L)
```

![]()
